name: ChatSpark
author: ChatSpark.io

sections.description:
Dive into the world of omnichannel AI chatbots and boost your customer interactions across all platforms! Website? Check! Social media? Absolutely! Even messaging apps like WhatsApp and Slack? You bet! Say goodbye to the 9-5 constraints and hello to 24/7 efficient customer support. Let’s supercharge your engagement and save on those staffing costs. Elevate your customer experience with ChatSpark today!

The ChatSpark plugin allows ChatSpark customers to easily integrate their chatbots into their WordPress sites. Simply install and activate the plugin, enter your Chatbot ID in the plugin settings panel, and you’re all set.

Note: A ChatSpark account and an active subscription are required to obtain a Chatbot ID and use this plugin. Visit ChatSpark.io to sign up and explore pricing plans.

Third-Party Service Disclosure

The ChatSpark plugin utilizes the ChatSpark.io service to operate. This service powers the AI chatbots integrated on your WordPress site, allowing seamless interaction and engagement with your visitors. All communication between your site and ChatSpark.io is secure and is intended to enhance your site’s functionality by providing automated chat support.

Before using this plugin, please review the following important information:
– ChatSpark Terms of Service: https://chatspark.io/terms-and-conditions
– ChatSpark Privacy Policy: https://chatspark.io/privacy-policy

Using this plugin implies acceptance of these terms and an understanding of how ChatSpark.io handles data. Please ensure you comply with all legal requirements for data transmission and use in your jurisdiction.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire chatspark folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. After activation, you’ll see a menu named ChatSpark on the left side of the WordPress admin dashboard.
  4. Click on it, enter your Chatbot ID, and save the changes.
  5. The chatbot will now be embedded on your site.
sections.faq:
Where can I find my ChatSpark Chatbot ID?

You can find your chatbot ID by logging into ChatSpark.io, going to My AI Chatbots > find your Chatbot > copy the ID.
